title: 几个碉堡了的1.8旗帜
author: jjxxz2
txt_content:
使用give代码即可获得。

刷出来之后从左到右摆起来就是了/give @p minecraft:banner 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{Base:15,Patterns:[{Pattern:gra,Color:8},{Pattern:vh,Color:1},{Pattern:ms,Color:1},{Pattern:ts,Color:1}]}}复制代码/give @p minecraft:banner 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{Base:15,Patterns:[{Pattern:ls,Color:11},{Pattern:rs,Color:11},{Pattern:bs,Color:11}]}}复制代码/give @p minecraft:banner 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{Base:15,Patterns:[{Pattern:bo,Color:4},{Pattern:rs,Color:15}]}}复制代码/give @p minecraft:banner 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{Base:15,Patterns:[{Pattern:ls,Color:10},{Pattern:cr,Color:10}]}}复制代码



第一个摆起来截图的人奖励2人气ww

replies.author: jjxxz2
replies.txt_content:
